page.title: 06Home Life - Youth Clubs
page.content:
1. After tea I have a cornet lesson with my Dad. On Tuesday and Friday evenings I go to band practice with Hade Edge Band. There are lots of brass bands around this area.
2. When I arrive home from school I collect the house key from our neighbour, as my Mum is still at work at that time. My brothers attend the local Primary School and they arrive home at 4.00 pm. My Mum comes home at 4.15 pm and she then makes tea for us. We have to take turns to help wash the dishes.
3. The Youth Club is from 7.00 pm until 9.00 pm. It costs 5 pence to get in. There is a disco room, a games room and another where you can bake. 4.After tea I practice violin or piano
